reviews.review: seamlessly flows through drastically different tones and themes. When matched with this boat load of characters the writers manage to give the characters more development and expands upon past movies interpretation those characters. THANOS, easily the best mcu villain with being menacing and extremly powerfull with tons of layers. The acting absolutely transforms these characters. Overall this is a cinematic achievement and demands you see it on the big screen. This is the definition of a comic book movie

Malgré toute la mauvaise volonté du monde, force est de constater qu'Infinity War est le meilleur crossover Marvel depuis l'inception du MCU. 10 ans après son inception, le MCU est enfin parvenu à livrer un épisode qui parvient constamment à trouver la balance entre comédie et drame, tout en offrant scène d'action sur scène d'action, plutôt bien réalisées et avec des CGI bien meilleurs que ceux des derniers opus. Les personnages ont quasiment tous leur petit moment de gloire, même ceux qui ne sont là que quelques minutes (Scarlett Johansson a dû tourner une seule après-midi, Idris Elba ne devait même pas être sur le plateau). La seule chose qui gâche vraiment l'ensemble est la communication autour du film, qui annihile tout danger pour les personnages dont on a annoncé la présence dans des films ultérieurs. En tuant tout sens de danger, Marvel atténue toute l'émotion d'un film qui ne demande que cela. Dommage.
Awesome, amazing, incredible and I don't have words I love the movie

Just as much fun as Thor Ragnarok. Can't deny that marvel studios know how to make good superhero movies, and I did not know that Disney would even think about giving us a dark ending like that. I'm so excited for Avengers 4!!!!!

The sheer scope of the movie threatens to make it fall under it's own weight. The incredible talents of the directors and cast make it work like a well oiled machine. More than impressed, this is the MCU's version of Empire Strikes Back. It'll live on as THE movie for years to come.
Excellent movie that had many twists and turns. Not a boring minute!!!

This review is based off of the experience that I had had in watching it. I won't review or give any spoilers.  With that being said....  Epic, just EPIC...!! This movie lived up to the hype and was more than what I was expecting. It has you going though all the emotions that you would think that you would have for these characters that you got to know over the 10 years that the MCU has been around. You laugh, gasp, choke up, get fired up,  and even ask, 'Wait... What the...?" Just awesome! I look forward to seeing this movie again cause there was so much going on.
Such a a great film. Very smooth transitions and great introductions and flow for each character. Very good story telling and action!
